projects.title: WNFA 3D Virtual Gallery
projects.desc: 3D Virtual Gallery that displays the poster results generated by WNFA at Zhejiang Exhibition Hall from 06.01.2022 to 06.12.2022

projects.title: WNFA Poster Generator
projects.desc: WNFA Poster Generator - The online version of the WNFA project powered by Azure serverless products. You can write a poem and use the website to generate a unique poster for that poem

projects.title: Aghnu's ASCII Art Generator
projects.desc: A creative frontend project that generates ASCII art from images/videos with client side doing the image processing.
